content: ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern continuation placemat continue of round 3 3dc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch4 space repeat from * to * x 4 until ch1 space before corner see pictures f and g continue of round 3 double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 10dc in space corner ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch4 space repeat from * to * x 2 3dc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch4 space x 3 see picture h and i ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern continuation placemat continue of round 3 repeat from * to * x 2 until ch1 space before corner double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 10dc in space corner ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space single_crochet next ch4 space repeat from * to * x 4 3dc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next ch4 space repeat from * to * x 4 until chain space before corner repeat pattern from to until end join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet of the round pictures j k and l shows how it will look at end of this round fasten_off cut yarn weave in ends ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern coaster chain 24 diagram available for main part follow same instructions from placemat pattern for row 1 to row 10 you will be working on the round facing the right side from here never turn your work follow same instructions from placemat pattern for round 1 and 2 note at the end of round 1 you will have in each top and bottom length 12 dcs 4 ch3 sps 2 ch1 sps and you will have on each side width 10 dcs 3 ch3 sps and 2 ch1 sps this is important to the last round afterwards for all stitches placements to be correct see picture m ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern coaster round 3 ch1 *single_crochet in next ch4 space skip next single_crochet 6dc in next ch4 space skip next single_crochet* repeat from * to * 1 more time single_crochet in next ch4 space skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 skip next single_crochet 10 double_crochet in space corner ch1 skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next ch1 space skip next single_crochet *single_crochet in next ch4 space 3dc in next single_crochet* repeat from * to * x 2 skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next chain 1 space ch1 skip next single_crochet 10 dcs in space corner ch1 skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next ch1 space repeat pattern between until end join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet of beg round see pictures below fasten_off cut yarn weave in ends top/bottom will look like this sides will look like this ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira diagram main ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern napkin ring you will be working inside the wooden ring start with a slip knot and attach yarn with a standing single_crochet counts as st to the wooden ring
